name: Don't Spend All Your Money
description:
Don't Spend All Your Money is a 5-player duel card game where players need to compete with each others for the opportunities of making purchases that can enhance your happiness, first to reach 100 happiness wins the game.

Link to the game (playingcards.io)

Don't Spend All Your Money ⋅ gsahhu ⋅ PlayingCards.io Virtual Tabletop

You can also download the pdfs of all the cards and tokens:

- 30 scenario cards, remember to print 30 card backs as well

- 5 action cards, remember to print 5 card backs as well

- 1 destination card, remember to print the card back as well

- 5 target tokens, remember to print 5 token backs as well

- 5 player tokens, remember to print 5 token backs as well
